meanings.definition: Relating to the redistribution of resources or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The redistributional policy aimed to share wealth more equally among the citizens.
meanings.sent2: The government implemented a redistributional plan to ensure fair access to resources.
meanings.sent3: The redistributional strategy made everyone feel like they won the lottery!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a redistributional force, spreading happiness to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The redistributional concept painted a picture of balance and fairness in society.

meanings.definition: Involving the act of redistributing resources or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The redistributional process required careful planning and execution.
meanings.sent2: Companies often engage in redistributional activities to support communities in need.
meanings.sent3: The redistributional project turned into a fun competition among the team members.
meanings.sent4: His words had a redistributional effect, shifting resources to those who needed them most.
meanings.sent5: The redistributional effort transformed the landscape of opportunity for many individuals.
